name: Doubt
story_text: You tug at the strings of the foe's anima and unravel them, allowing someone else to take advantage of their drive.
effect: This ability gains an edge against a target with a soul (see *[Draw Steel: Monsters](https://mcdm.gg/DS-Monsters)*). After you make the power roll, you or one ally within distance have a double edge on the next power roll you make before the end of the encounter.
special_effect: Strained: You feel dispirited until you finish a respite. If you obtain a tier 3 outcome on the power roll, you and the target each have damage weakness 5 (save ends).
